name: High heels Stacking mechanics - 3D Hyper casual game template
name_original: High heels Stacking mechanics - 3D Hyper casual game template
description:
Touch the screen and move your girl, avoid obstacles and collect blocks to stack and reach the very top at the finish line. This is a simple addicting hyper-casual game template with Stacking Mechanics and girl with Animation.

What do I get by purchasing an asset?

The popular stacking mechanic of games like high heels and cube surfer, you just have to create levels.

The game is almost ready for publication.
Convenient level editor.
Convenient and understandable documentation, fully documented code.
The game is fully debugged for mobile devices.
24/7 support, you can contact us with any questions.

If you have any questions, don' t hesitate to contact us at: codemireofficial@gmail.com
